alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Eastern Las Animas County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft; Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft; Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 29 at 3:05PM MDT until March 30 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...the Wet Mountain Valley, Central and Eastern Fremont, Pueblo, Huerfano, Las Animas and Baca Counties. * WHEN...From noon to 8 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile and light weight vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing dust could significantly reduce visibility on area highways.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
